about_the_game:
Trapped underground after a nuclear apocalypse, an unqualified survival “expert” must now lead a growing community of followers who believe in his every word.

In Deeper Underground, you must scavenge, build, and lead while keeping morale high and your lies intact. Manage resources, make tough choices, and navigate the psychological pressure of maintaining your fake expertise—because if the truth gets out, survival might be the least of your worries.

Key Features:

  • Base Building & Resource Management – Construct and expand your underground shelter, ensuring your community has enough food, water, and supplies.

  • Scavenge the Ruins – Venture into the wasteland in search of valuable resources, but be wary of dangers lurking in the darkness.

  • Choice-Driven Narrative – Shape the story with the lies you tell and the decisions you make—will you admit the truth or keep up the façade?

  • Dynamic Community System – Manage followers with different personalities, needs, and levels of trust in you. Keep them loyal… or risk rebellion.

  • Survival Mechanics – Monitor hunger, radiation exposure, and mental well-being as you fight to stay alive in a crumbling world.

  • Moral Dilemmas – Sacrifice individuals for the greater good, hoard resources, or inspire hope—your leadership style will define your fate.

Can you keep your followers alive… and your secret hidden?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 265 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: Trapped underground after a nuclear apocalypse, a fake survival expert must face the fallout of his lies. Build, scavenge, and lead your community in this darkly comedic survival game where every choice matters.
